name: multi-crypto-price-converter
description: A WordPress plugin that lists cryptocurrency prices and allows instant conversion of prices between any of the listed coins.
author: Carlos Guzman

scripts.build:php: composer install --no-dev && php-scoper add-prefix -o multi-crypto-price-converter --force && npm run build:autoload && composer install
scripts.build:autoload: cp composer.json multi-crypto-price-converter/ && composer --no-dev dump-autoload --classmap-authoritative --working-dir=multi-crypto-price-converter && rm multi-crypto-price-converter/composer.json
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build:php && npm run build:front && npm run copy:plugin-files && npm run zip
